title: Earthquake
description: A deadly earthquake just hit, ripping up the streets

title: Hurricane
description: A large wind circle spotted in the coast, creating havoc and panic

title: Tornado
description: A violent wind circle comes crushing in, tearing up buildings and sending cats flying

title: Tsunami
description: A big wave of water was just spotted on the coast

title: Flood
description: Water is covering the entire region, tens of thousands of people are sitting on their roofs waiting for evacuation

title: Cold Wave
description: Snow is covering as far as the eye can see, people are freezing

title: Atom Bomb
description: A big mushroom cloud was just spotted, blowing up

title: Sharknado
description: Watch out! Sharks are falling from the sky and eating people!

title: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Zombies are taking over. Humans are struggling to stay away from thse walking beasts

title: Meteor Strike
description: A big flying rock flies out of the sky and knocks one guy out. good job!

title: Jesus has risen
description: Jesus comes down from heaven, realizes the mistake he has made, kills 10 men out of spite, and goes back to where he came from

title: Scientists fight to find a cure
description: The infectious disease specialists have grown tired of letting everyone die

title: Doctors have cured a strain
description: The humans have fought hard, and developed an immunity

title: The Clouds have parted
description: Bad weather has gone, leaving the humans with hope

title: If there was a zombie apocalypse, there isn't one now.
description: The townspeople have crowded together to shoot down all zombie looking people. They claim all were zombies, but who knows

title: Looting incurs
description: Hundreds have gotten together to take over the local supermarket

title: The Government is being overthrown
description: The mutants have taken over

title: Santa is coming to town
description: The thought of the elf slaver coming to town gives everyone hope

title: United States invades your country
description: Looks like Donald Trump thinks you have oil... I mean freedom

title: R. Kelly gets out of jail
description: Little girl's hearts around the globe skip a beat

title: Satan emerges from ashes of dead infants
description: He brought coke and hookers

title: Everyone's a trillionare
description: Too bad it's in Zimbabwe's currency, meaning everyone has roughly $0.004
